name: LofiStudy
0:
”Alexa, open lofi study”
”Alexa, start lofi study”
”Alexa, launch lofi study”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lofi study
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Immerse yourself in the chill and relaxing vibes of Lo-Fi music with the "Lofi Study" skill.
Whether you need a soothing soundtrack for studying, focusing, or just relaxing, this skill offers a handpicked selection of Lo-Fi tracks designed to create a calm and pleasant atmosphere. 

Start with a free selection of tracks, or upgrade to the premium package to unlock unlimited access to all Lo-Fi tracks without any restrictions. 

With the premium subscription, you can listen to any track, anytime, for as long as you like, creating a continuous and personalized music flow. 

Let Alexa be your daily soundtrack with "Lofi Study".
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
